content: बलात्कारः {@--1@} Using violence, employing force. {@--2@} Outrage, violence, force, oppression, exaction; <ls>R. 10. 47</ls>; बलात्कारेण निर्वर्त्य &c. {@--3@} Injustice. {@--4@} (In law) Detention of the person of a debter by the creditor and the employment of forcible means to recover the debt.
